segment.source: Checklist for Evaluating Line-of-Business Applications for UE-V 1.0
segment.target: Checklist for Evaluating Line-of-Business Applications for UE-V 1.0

segment.source: Checklist for Evaluating Line-of-Business Applications for UE-V 1.0
segment.target: Checklist for Evaluating Line-of-Business Applications for UE-V 1.0

segment.source: Checklist for Evaluating Line-of-Business Applications for UE-V 1.0
segment.target: Checklist for Evaluating Line-of-Business Applications for UE-V 1.0

segment.source: To evaluate which line-of-business applications should be included in your UE-V deployment, consider the following:
segment.target: To evaluate which line-of-business applications should be included in your UE-V deployment, consider the following:

segment.source: Description
segment.target: Description

segment.source: Does this application contain settings that the user can customize?
segment.target: Does this application contain settings that the user can customize?

segment.source: Is it important for the user that these settings roam?
segment.target: Is it important for the user that these settings roam?

segment.source: Are these user settings already managed by an application management or settings policy solution?
segment.target: Are these user settings already managed by an application management or settings policy solution?

segment.source: UE-V applies application settings at application launch and Windows settings at logon, unlock, or remote connect events.
segment.target: UE-V applies application settings at application launch and Windows settings at logon, unlock, or remote connect events.

segment.source: If you use UE-V with other settings policy solutions, users might experience inconsistency across roamed settings.
segment.target: If you use UE-V with other settings policy solutions, users might experience inconsistency across roamed settings.

segment.source: Are the application settings specific to the computer?
segment.target: Are the application settings specific to the computer?

segment.source: Application preferences and customizations that are associated with hardware or specific computer configurations do not consistently roam across sessions and can cause a poor application experience.
segment.target: Application preferences and customizations that are associated with hardware or specific computer configurations do not consistently roam across sessions and can cause a poor application experience.

segment.source: Does the application store settings in the Program Files directory or in the file directory that is located in the Users \ [User name] \ AppDataLocalLow directory?
segment.target: Does the application store settings in the Program Files directory or in the file directory that is located in the Users \ [User name] \ AppDataLocalLow directory?

segment.source: Application data that is stored in either of these locations usually should not roam with the user, because this data is specific to the computer or because the data is too large to roam.
segment.target: Application data that is stored in either of these locations usually should not roam with the user, because this data is specific to the computer or because the data is too large to roam.

segment.source: Does the application store any settings in a file that contains other application data that should not roam?
segment.target: Does the application store any settings in a file that contains other application data that should not roam?

segment.source: UE-V synchronizes files as a single unit.
segment.target: UE-V synchronizes files as a single unit.

segment.source: If settings are stored in files that include application data other than settings, then synchronizing this additional data may cause a poor application experience.
segment.target: If settings are stored in files that include application data other than settings, then synchronizing this additional data may cause a poor application experience.

segment.source: How large are the files that contain the settings?
segment.target: How large are the files that contain the settings?

segment.source: The performance of the settings synchronization can be affected by large files.
segment.target: The performance of the settings synchronization can be affected by large files.

segment.source: Including large files can impact the performance of settings synchronization.
segment.target: Including large files can impact the performance of settings synchronization.

segment.target: Related topics
